metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: GEORGE W. SIMONS, JR.  MEM.   AM.   SOC.   O.  E.  MEM.   AM.   ISTST.    OF   PASWBES  MUNICIPA, ENGINEERING  RESEARCH AND planning  HIDEBHANDT Building  Jacksonville, FORIDA      [ 2 ]  October 11, 1943.  Mr. Robert N. S. WhiteIan, Director,  Carolina irt Issocialtion,  Gibbes Memoria irt Gallery,  Charleston, South Carolina.  Dear Mr. Whitelaw:  Thanks for sending me a copy of the po. It is very  interesting; something of that kind might be usefu inTampa.  enclosed is a copy of a letter just received this morning  from Mr. Edmunds, itho he does not say much, it appears that  the County Board is still doing something. He does not refect  any attitude of pessimism. It would be interesting to see what  maps they are working on.  I am leaving here tomorrow for a several days trip into  the Evergades. will be back here Saturday. The next Monday  and Tuesday I shall have to be in Tampa after which much of  my time must be devoted to a: report.  Consequenty it now appears that I can hardy expect to be in Charleston much before  the last week of the month. However I will advise you of any  changes.  Best regards.  Sincerely yours,  GWStEBB    ?   J",,
